items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Flattering!!!
items.body: I love the sweater, Soft and fits well. Its cozy but not overbearing. Will buy more.!!! Read more
items.author: My Fair Lady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s giving cozy for fall y’all
items.body: Wow!! Such a comfy cozy sweater! Great quality and super soft. I love the style of the sleeves. The ruffles add a little pizazz. I ordered an XL and thought it was a tad big but who doesn’t love a big chunky sweater for the fall? It fit great and I paired it with stretchy leggings and boots. Love it! Read more
items.author: Alicia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cuddly.
items.body: This knit is so soft and cuddly. It is one of the softest sweaters I own. I do wish it came in a XXL for larger ladies. The color is as soft and as pretty as the sweater itself and the bit of ruffle on the sleeve makes it unique and very feminine. Read more
items.author: Beck N

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Sweater!
items.body: Five stars all the way. This sweater is really, really soft and very comfortable on. The material is super cozy and doesn't feel scratchy against your skin at all. I recently wore it for the first time for several hours and didn't even wear a shirt underneath and I didn't feel itchy once. My favorite part of the sweater is at the end of each sleeve is a slight ruffle. It's so cute and feminine. I ordered a small and it fit me great but also had a lot of extra room in it. I am 118 pounds, 5' 4". Read more
items.author: Everyday Elle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy
items.body: Women’s oatmeal colored mock turtleneck sweater. The material is soft, thick and warm. The color is beautiful and seasonal. The fit is an oversized loose style. The sleeves are oversized and the wrist area is ruffled like a flower. I love the look of the sweater on me. I ordered a medium size and I wear a medium and it fits great. The quality is also good. I like the versatility and the ease of styling it. I would definitely recommend this and I need it in another color immediately. Read more
items.author: nichcole clark

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft cozy and stylish sweater perfect for fall
items.body: This sweater is soft cozy and stylish and exactly what I wanted for fall. The knit fabric feels very comfortable and has just enough stretch so it does not feel tight. I wore it with leggings today and loved the loose oversized fit. It has a nice flow without being shapeless. The brown color I chose is solid and versatile and easy to pair with jeans leggings or even a skirt with tights. The turtleneck is warm but not too snug and the ruffled lantern sleeves give it a unique look that makes it stand out from a basic pullover. I can see myself wearing this often because it works for casual days the office or even going out. Sizing runs true to the chart but since it is oversized if you are in between sizes you could go smaller for a neater look. For me the fit was just right. I have a feeling this sweater will be in my regular rotation all winter. It looks nice and feels great to wear. Read more
items.author: Mom next-door

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sweater isn’t thick
items.body: Sweater is cute but fabric is too thin Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cozy, and flattering — perfect for chilly days
items.body: This sweater feels so soft and comfortable — it’s like being wrapped in a cloud! The baby blue color is really pretty and looks fresh in person. It has a relaxed, slightly oversized fit that drapes nicely without looking too bulky. The knit is thick enough to keep warm but still breathable. The sleeves are loose and give a cozy, casual look. The neckline is more of a mock neck than a full turtleneck, which I actually prefer since it doesn’t feel tight. Only small downside is that it sheds a little at first, but after a gentle wash, it gets better. Overall, a great fall and winter piece that’s cute, comfy, and easy to style. Read more
items.author: V.V.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
